guideLinesLanguagesLocale: Warning: Do not alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE and currentLocale fields. They are linked to the website language. For example, changing 'en' to 'en_US' will lead to a non-existent page (e.g., https://excellence-conciergerie.com/en_US). Existing locales are pt, en, fr, es. Do not add non-existent locales. Only modify based on the current translation file. fr/common.js currentLocale should always be 'fr', en/common.js currentLocale should always be 'en', etc.
guideLinesLinks: Avertissement : Les seules valeurs acceptées pour les champs DO_NOT_CHANGE dans navLinks sont les IDs actuels du site web, qui sont les suivants : how-it-works, introduction, why-us, team, about, servies, faq, after-before, contact
heroSubtitle: Your Partner in Cleanliness and Comfort
heroFirstParagraph: At Excellence Cleaners, we specialize in the art of impeccable cleanliness. As a leader in laundry and maintenance services for vacation accommodations along the Côte d'Azur, we are committed to exceeding your expectations in fabric care and customer service.
heroSecondParagraph: Our passion for excellence is reflected in every detail, from freshly laundered bedding to meticulously maintained textiles. Trust our expertise to transform your space into a sanctuary of comfort and cleanliness.

howItWorks.title: Convenient Collection
howItWorks.description: Schedule a pickup at your convenience and let us take care of your laundry.

howItWorks.title: Expert Treatment
howItWorks.description: Select the location and time you’d like our professionals to clean.

howItWorks.title: Quick Delivery
howItWorks.description: Receive your laundry impeccably washed and folded at your doorstep, ready to impress your guests.

introductionDescription: We take pride in offering a comprehensive range of laundry and maintenance services designed to exceed your expectations. Whether you manage a luxury hotel or vacation rentals, our experienced team ensures flawless results with every order. Explore our key advantages

introductionAdvantages.text: Exceptional attention to detail in every task.
Reliable and punctual service every time.
Customized solutions tailored to your needs.
Highly trained professionals dedicated to quality.
Flexible scheduling to fit your busy lifestyle.
Eco-friendly practices that benefit the environment.

whyUsDescription: At Excellence Cleaners, we stand out for our commitment to excellence and our passion for delivering exceptional laundry services. Here’s why we are the ideal choice for your needs:

whyUsReasons.title: Professionalism and Expertise
whyUsReasons.description: Our experienced team ensures comprehensive property management, maximizing visibility on prestigious platforms. Skilled professionals craft captivating descriptions to highlight unique features.

whyUsReasons.title: Attention to Detail
whyUsReasons.description: We pay meticulous attention to every detail, ensuring that all laundry and textiles are handled with the utmost care and precision.

whyUsReasons.title: Reliable and Timely Service
whyUsReasons.description: We pride ourselves on delivering reliable and timely services, ensuring that your laundry needs are met with efficiency and consistency.

whyUsReasons.title: Customized Solutions
whyUsReasons.description: We offer tailored solutions to meet your specific needs, providing personalized service that adapts to your requirements.

whyUsReasons.title: State-of-the-Art Equipment
whyUsReasons.description: Our use of modern, high-quality equipment ensures superior results and enhances the overall effectiveness of our cleaning processes.

messageDescription: Welcome to Excellence Cleaners. As the Managing Director, I am delighted to welcome you. For property owners, we take care of your property with passion and confidentiality. For travelers, we promise an exceptional and discreet experience. Excellence Cleaners embodies refinement, discretion, and personal attention. Welcome to excellence.
teamSubtitle: Our Commitment to Our Team and Community
teamTitle: A Team Dedicated to Your Satisfaction
teamDescription: At Excellence Cleaners, we view our employees as the heart of our business. We value each team member and are committed to creating a work environment where they can thrive and excel. Simultaneously, we firmly believe in our responsibility to the local community that supports us. Discover what sets our team apart.
teamMinorDescriptionFirst: Our employees receive rigorous and ongoing training to ensure the highest quality service.
teamMinorDescriptionSecond: We actively contribute to the well-being of our community through sustainable initiatives and responsible practices.
aboutDescription: At Excellence Cleaners, we are dedicated to transforming every stay into an unforgettable experience through our top-quality laundry services. Since our inception, we have distinguished ourselves through our commitment to excellence, our dedication to our employees, and our positive contribution to the local community.

services.title: Comprehensive Luxury Property Management
services.description: We offer a full range of luxury property management services, including maintenance, security, reservation management, and personalized services for property owners and travelers. Our expert team ensures that your property is managed to the highest standards.

services.title: Customized Maintenance Services
services.description: We provide tailored maintenance solutions to meet the specific needs of your property. Our services include regular upkeep, emergency repairs, and detailed inspections to ensure your property remains in excellent condition.

services.title: Comprehensive Residential Property Management
services.description: Our residential property management services include everything from tenant relations to routine maintenance and financial management. We handle every aspect of property management to ensure your residential property is well-maintained and profitable.

services.title: Luxury Maintenance and Management Service
services.description: Our luxury maintenance services are designed to cater to high-end properties. We provide meticulous care and management, ensuring that every detail of your property meets the highest standards of luxury.

services.title: Global Luxury Heritage Management
services.description: We specialize in managing luxury heritage properties, offering comprehensive services that include preservation, maintenance, and enhancement of your property's historical value and aesthetics.

services.title: Concierge Services for Prestige Properties
services.description: Our concierge services are tailored for high-end properties, providing personalized assistance to meet the needs of both property owners and their guests. From bespoke requests to everyday needs, we ensure a seamless and exceptional experience.

faqDescriptionOne: At Excellence Cleaners, we are dedicated to excellence and passionate about delivering exceptional laundry services. Here’s why we are the ideal choice for your needs:
faqDescriptionTwo: At Excellence Cleaners, we are dedicated to excellence and passionate about delivering exceptional laundry services. Here’s why we are the ideal choice for your needs:

faq.title: What services does Excellence Cleaners offer?
faq.description: Excellence Cleaners offers a comprehensive range of luxury property management services, including maintenance, security, reservation management, and personalized services for both property owners and travelers.

faq.title: How does the 24/7 monitoring by Excellence Cleaners work?
faq.description: Our 24/7 monitoring relies on advanced technology and a dedicated team to ensure a quick response to any incidents, guaranteeing the complete security of your property.

faq.title: What are the benefits of Excellence Cleaners' exclusive partnerships?
faq.description: Excellence Cleaners maintains exclusive partnerships with construction companies, architects, interior designers, and other professionals. This ensures high-quality interventions to enhance and maintain the aesthetic value of your property.

faq.title: Why choose Excellence Cleaners to manage my luxury property?
faq.description: Excellence Cleaners stands out for its commitment to excellence, transparency in every service provided, and its ability to offer tailored solutions that precisely meet your needs. We ensure your property remains immaculate and well-maintained at all times.

faq.title: What are the cancellation terms for Excellence Cleaners' services?
faq.description: You can cancel our services at any time by contacting us directly. We strive to make the cancellation process as simple and transparent as possible for our clients.

faq.title: How can I make a special request to Excellence Cleaners?
faq.description: For any special requests, whether specific needs for your property or personalized services for an event, please contact us directly. We are here to address your specific needs and provide a customized solution.

contactDescription: Ready to elevate your hospitality and commit to excellence? Please fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you shortly to discuss how we can help you offer unforgettable stays to your guests.
thankYouForYourSubmission: Thank you for your submission. We will get back to you shortly.

array.title: 1. Introduction
array.description: Welcome to our website. By continuing to browse and use this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which govern our relationship with you in relation to this website, as well as our privacy policy.

array.title: 2. Website Usage License
array.description: Unless otherwise stated, we or our licensors own the intellectual property rights in the website and the material on the website. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved.

array.title: 3. Acceptable Use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way that is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 4. Limitations of Liability
array.description: We will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contact, tort, or otherwise) in relation to the content, use of, or otherwise in connection with this website: for any indirect, special, or consequential loss; or for any loss of business, revenue, profits, anticipated savings, contracts, or commercial relationships, loss of reputation or goodwill, or loss or corruption of information or data.

array.title: 5. Acceptable Use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way that is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 1. Information We Collect
array.description: We may collect the following information: name, contact details including email address, demographic information such as postal code, preferences and interests, and other relevant information for customer surveys and/or offers.

array.title: 2. Use of Collected Information
array.description: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons: internal record keeping, improvement of our products and services, sending promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information we think you may find interesting using the email address you have provided.

array.title: 3. Security
array.description: We are committed to ensuring the security of your information. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have implemented suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

array.title: 4. Use of Cookies
array.description: A cookie is a small file that asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added, and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes, and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.

footerDescription: Excellence Cleaners is a luxury property management agency based on the French Riviera. Our dedicated team offers personalized services to meet the unique needs of each property owner.
